DialogueText.Text: Have you finished charging the Wayfinder?
I see. If you have any Aerialite Ore on hand, you should be able to use that. Just place it down and direct the Wayfinder towards it!
Excellent work! It's quite amazing. We're likely the first to actually use a Wayfinder since the Draconic Era! Truly a most honored privilage.
Let us begin our journey then! Please, lead the way.
